disclaimerText: This forecast is intended to provide information on expected pollution levels in areas of significant public exposure. It may not apply in very specific locations close to unusually strong or short-lived local sources of pollution.

currentForecast.forecastSummary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Tuesday 15 February to end of Tuesday 15 February GMT
currentForecast.forecastText: Tuesday will be cloudy and rather wet, with some strong wind gusts. Perhaps drier and brighter later before more rain arrives during the evening. Temperatures around average. Little by way of imported pollution is expected. <br/><br/>Air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Ozone<br/>PM10 Particulates<br/>PM2.5 Particulates<br/>Sulphur Dioxide<br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>

currentForecast.forecastSummary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Wednesday 16 February to end of Wednesday 16 February GMT
currentForecast.forecastText: On Wednesday, becoming very windy, with widespread gales. Cloudy with outbreaks of rain. Little by way of imported pollution is expected. <br/><br/>Air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Ozone<br/>PM10 Particulates<br/>PM2.5 Particulates<br/>Sulphur Dioxide<br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>
